title: Legacy of women rulers in Africa- description

content.question: Which of the following describes a legacy of women rulers in Africa?

choices.label: The leadership of African women led to the adoption of Islam in West and Central Africa.
The rule of African women led to the strengthening of military power that would end the transatlantic slave trade.
The leadership of women rulers in Africa led to diplomatic disputes in the Mediterranean region.
The rule of African women became a symbol of leadership for women in the African diaspora.

content.answer: The rule of African women became a symbol of leadership for women in the African diaspora.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
